verses.verse: <S%G2532>Then<s%> the <S%G537>whole<s%> <S%G4128>body<s%> of them <S%G450>arose<s%> and <S%G71>brought<s%> Him <S%G1909>before<s%> <S%G4091>Pilate.<s%>

And they <S%G757>began<s%> to <S%G2723>accuse<s%> Him, <S%G3004>saying,<s%> "We <S%G2147>found<s%> <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G3778>man<s%> <S%G1294>misleading<s%> our <S%G1484>nation<s%> and <S%G2967>forbidding<s%> to <S%G1325>pay<s%> <S%G5411>taxes<s%> to <S%G2541>Caesar,<s%> and <S%G3004>saying<s%> that He <S%G1438>Himself<s%> is <S%G5547>Christ,<s%> a <S%G935>King.<s%>"

And <S%G4091>Pilate<s%> <S%G2065>asked<s%> Him, <S%G3004>saying,<s%> "Are You the <S%G935>King<s%> of the <S%G2453>Jews<s%>?" And He <S%G611>answered<s%> him and <S%G5346>said,<s%> "[It is as] you <S%G3004>say.<s%>"

And <S%G4091>Pilate<s%> <S%G3004>said<s%> to the <S%G749>chief<s%> <S%G749>priests<s%> and the <S%G3793>multitudes,<s%> "I <S%G2147>find<s%> <S%G3762>no<s%> <S%G159>guilt<s%> in <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G444>man.<s%>"

But they kept on <S%G2001>insisting,<s%> <S%G3004>saying,<s%> "He <S%G383>stirs<s%> up the <S%G2992>people,<s%> <S%G1321>teaching<s%> <S%G3650>all<s%> <S%G2596>over<s%> <S%G2453>Judea,<s%> <S%G757>starting<s%> from <S%G1056>Galilee,<s%> even as <S%G2193>far<s%> as <S%G5602>this<s%> <S%G5602>place.<s%>"
But when <S%G4091>Pilate<s%> <S%G191>heard<s%> it, he <S%G1905>asked<s%> <S%G1487>whether<s%> the <S%G444>man<s%> was a <S%G1057>Galilean.<s%>

And when he <S%G1921>learned<s%> that He <S%G1510>belonged<s%> <S%G1537><s%> to <S%G2264>Herod<s%>'s <S%G1849>jurisdiction,<s%> he <S%G375>sent<s%> Him to Herod, who <S%G846>himself<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> was in <S%G2414>Jerusalem<s%> at that <S%G2250>time.<s%>

<S%G1161>Now<s%> <S%G2264>Herod<s%> was <S%G3029>very<s%> <S%G5463>glad<s%> when he <S%G3708>saw<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus;<s%> for he <S%G1510>had<s%> <S%G2309>wanted<s%> to <S%G3708>see<s%> Him for a <S%G2425>long<s%> <S%G5550>time,<s%> <S%G1223>because<s%> he had been <S%G191>hearing<s%> <S%G4012>about<s%> Him and was <S%G1679>hoping<s%> to <S%G3708>see<s%> <S%G5100>some<s%> <S%G4592>sign<s%> <S%G1096>performed<s%> by Him.
And he <S%G1905>questioned<s%> Him at <S%G2425>some<s%> <S%G3056>length<s%><S%G2425>;<s%> but He <S%G611>answered<s%> him <S%G3762>nothing.<s%>
And the <S%G749>chief<s%> <S%G749>priests<s%> and the <S%G1122>scribes<s%> were <S%G2476>standing<s%> there, <S%G2723>accusing<s%> Him <S%G2159>vehemently.<s%>

And <S%G2264>Herod<s%> with his <S%G4753>soldiers,<s%> after <S%G1848>treating<s%> Him with <S%G1848>contempt<s%> and <S%G1702>mocking<s%> Him, <S%G4016>dressed<s%> Him in a <S%G2986>gorgeous<s%> <S%G2066>robe<s%> and <S%G375>sent<s%> Him <S%G375>back<s%> to <S%G4091>Pilate.<s%>

<S%G1161>Now<s%> <S%G2264>Herod<s%> and <S%G4091>Pilate<s%> <S%G1096>became<s%> <S%G5384>friends<s%> with <S%G240>one<s%> <S%G240>another<s%> that <S%G846>very<s%> <S%G2250>day;<s%> for <S%G4391>before<s%> they had <S%G4391>been<s%> <S%G1510><s%> at <S%G2189>enmity<s%> with <S%G848>each<s%> <S%G848>other.<s%>
And <S%G4091>Pilate<s%> <S%G4779>summoned<s%> the <S%G749>chief<s%> <S%G749>priests<s%> and the <S%G758>rulers<s%> and the <S%G2992>people,<s%>

and <S%G3004>said<s%> to them, "You <S%G4374>brought<s%> <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G444>man<s%> to me as one who <S%G654>incites<s%> the <S%G2992>people<s%> to <S%G654>rebellion,<s%> and <S%G2400>behold,<s%> having <S%G350>examined<s%> Him <S%G1799>before<s%> you, I have <S%G2147>found<s%> <S%G3762>no<s%> <S%G159>guilt<s%> in <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G444>man<s%> regarding the <S%G2723>charges<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> you <S%G2723>make<s%> <S%G2596>against<s%> Him.

<S%G235>"No,<s%> <S%G3761>nor<s%> has <S%G2264>Herod,<s%> for he <S%G375>sent<s%> Him <S%G375>back<s%> to us; and <S%G2400>behold,<s%> <S%G3762>nothing<s%> <S%G514>deserving<s%> <S%G2288>death<s%> has <S%G1510>been<s%> <S%G4238>done<s%> by Him.
"I will <S%G3767>therefore<s%> <S%G3811>punish<s%> Him and <S%G630>release<s%> Him."
<S%G1161>[Now<s%> he was <S%G2192>obliged<s%> <S%G318><s%> to <S%G630>release<s%> to them at the <S%G1859>feast<s%> <S%G1520>one<s%> prisoner.]

But they <S%G349>cried<s%> out <S%G3826>all<s%> <S%G3826>together,<s%> <S%G3004>saying,<s%> <S%G142>"Away<s%> with <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G3778>man,<s%> and <S%G630>release<s%> for us <S%G912>Barabbas!<s%>"

(He was <S%G3748>one<s%> <S%G3748>who<s%> had been <S%G906>thrown<s%> into <S%G5438>prison<s%> for a <S%G5100>certain<s%> <S%G4714>insurrection<s%> <S%G1096>made<s%> in the <S%G4172>city,<s%> and for <S%G5408>murder.<s%>)
And <S%G4091>Pilate,<s%> <S%G2309>wanting<s%> to <S%G630>release<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus,<s%> <S%G4377>addressed<s%> them <S%G3825>again,<s%>
but they kept on <S%G2019>calling<s%> out, <S%G3004>saying,<s%> <S%G4717>"Crucify,<s%> <S%G4717>crucify<s%> Him!"

And he <S%G3004>said<s%> to them the <S%G5154>third<s%> <S%G5154>time,<s%> <S%G1063>"Why,<s%> <S%G5101>what<s%> <S%G2556>evil<s%> has <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G3778>man<s%> <S%G4160>done<s%>? I have <S%G2147>found<s%> in Him <S%G3762>no<s%> <S%G159>guilt<s%> [demanding] <S%G2288>death;<s%> I will <S%G3767>therefore<s%> <S%G3811>punish<s%> Him and <S%G630>release<s%> Him."
But they were <S%G1945>insistent,<s%> with <S%G3173>loud<s%> <S%G5456>voices<s%> <S%G154>asking<s%> that He be <S%G4717>crucified.<s%> And their <S%G5456>voices<s%> [began] to <S%G2729>prevail.<s%>
And <S%G4091>Pilate<s%> <S%G1948>pronounced<s%> <S%G1948>sentence<s%> that their <S%G155>demand<s%> should be <S%G1096>granted.<s%>

And he <S%G630>released<s%> the man they were <S%G154>asking<s%> for who had been <S%G906>thrown<s%> into <S%G5438>prison<s%> for <S%G4714>insurrection<s%> and <S%G5408>murder,<s%> but he <S%G3860>delivered<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> to their <S%G2307>will.<s%>

And <S%G5613>when<s%> they <S%G520>led<s%> Him <S%G520>away,<s%> they <S%G1949>laid<s%> <S%G1949>hold<s%> of <S%G5100>one<s%> <S%G4613>Simon<s%> of <S%G2956>Cyrene,<s%> <S%G2064>coming<s%> in from the <S%G68>country,<s%> and <S%G2007>placed<s%> on him the <S%G4716>cross<s%> to <S%G5342>carry<s%> <S%G3693>behind<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus.<s%>

And there were <S%G190>following<s%> Him a <S%G4183>great<s%> <S%G4128>multitude<s%> of the <S%G2992>people,<s%> and of <S%G1135>women<s%> <S%G3739>who<s%> were <S%G2875>mourning<s%> and <S%G2354>lamenting<s%> Him.

But <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G4762>turning<s%> to them <S%G3004>said,<s%> <S%G2364>"Daughters<s%> of <S%G2419>Jerusalem,<s%> <S%G3361>stop<s%> <S%G2799>weeping<s%> for Me, but <S%G2799>weep<s%> for <S%G1438>yourselves<s%> and for your <S%G5043>children.<s%>

"For <S%G2400>behold,<s%> the <S%G2250>days<s%> are <S%G2064>coming<s%> <S%G1722>when<s%> <S%G3739><s%> they will <S%G3004>say,<s%> <S%G3107>'Blessed<s%> are the <S%G4723>barren,<s%> and the <S%G2836>wombs<s%> that <S%G3756>never<s%> <S%G1080>bore,<s%> and the <S%G3149>breasts<s%> that <S%G3756>never<s%> <S%G5142>nursed.<s%>'
<S%G5119>"Then<s%> they will <S%G757>begin<s%> to <S%G3004>say<s%> to the <S%G3735>mountains,<s%> <S%G4098>'Fall<s%> on us,' and to the <S%G1015>hills,<s%> <S%G2572>'Cover<s%> us.'
" For <S%G1487>if<s%> they <S%G4160>do<s%> <S%G3778>these<s%> <S%G3778>things<s%> in the <S%G5200>green<s%> <S%G3586>tree,<s%> <S%G5101>what<s%> will <S%G1096>happen<s%> in the <S%G3584>dry<s%>?"
And <S%G1417>two<s%> <S%G2087>others<s%> <S%G2532>also,<s%> who were <S%G2557>criminals,<s%> were being <S%G71>led<s%> <S%G71>away<s%> to be <S%G337>put<s%> to <S%G337>death<s%> with Him.

And <S%G3753>when<s%> they <S%G2064>came<s%> to the <S%G5117>place<s%> <S%G2564>called<s%> The <S%G2898>Skull,<s%> <S%G1563>there<s%> they <S%G4717>crucified<s%> Him and the <S%G2557>criminals,<s%> <S%G3739>one<s%> on the <S%G1188>right<s%> and the <S%G3739>other<s%> on the <S%G710>left.<s%>

But <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> was <S%G3004>saying,<s%> <S%G3962>"Father,<s%> <S%G863>forgive<s%> them; for they do not <S%G3609>know<s%> <S%G5101>what<s%> they are <S%G4160>doing.<s%>" And they <S%G906>cast<s%> <S%G2819>lots,<s%> <S%G1266>dividing<s%> up His <S%G2440>garments<s%> <S%G1266>among<s%> themselves.

And the <S%G2992>people<s%> <S%G2476>stood<s%> by, <S%G2334>looking<s%> on. And <S%G2532>even<s%> the <S%G758>rulers<s%> were <S%G1592>sneering<s%> at Him, <S%G3004>saying,<s%> "He <S%G4982>saved<s%> <S%G243>others;<s%> let Him <S%G4982>save<s%> <S%G1438>Himself<s%> <S%G1487>if<s%> <S%G3778>this<s%> is the <S%G5547>Christ<s%> of <S%G2316>God,<s%> His <S%G1588>Chosen<s%> <S%G1588>One.<s%>"
And the <S%G4757>soldiers<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G1702>mocked<s%> Him, <S%G4334>coming<s%> up to Him, <S%G4374>offering<s%> Him <S%G3690>sour<s%> <S%G3690>wine,<s%>
and <S%G3004>saying,<s%> <S%G1487>"If<s%> You are the <S%G935>King<s%> of the <S%G2453>Jews,<s%> <S%G4982>save<s%> <S%G4572>Yourself!<s%>"
<S%G1161>Now<s%> there was <S%G2532>also<s%> an <S%G1923>inscription<s%> <S%G1909>above<s%> Him, <S%G3778>"THIS<s%> IS THE <S%G935>KING<s%> OF THE <S%G2453>JEWS.<s%>"

And <S%G1520>one<s%> of the <S%G2557>criminals<s%> who were <S%G2910>hanged<s%> [there] was <S%G987>hurling<s%> <S%G987>abuse<s%> at Him, <S%G3004>saying,<s%> "Are You not the <S%G5547>Christ<s%>? <S%G4982>Save<s%> <S%G4572>Yourself<s%> and us!"

But the <S%G2087>other<s%> <S%G611>answered,<s%> and <S%G2008>rebuking<s%> him <S%G5346>said,<s%> "Do you not <S%G3761>even<s%> <S%G5399>fear<s%> <S%G2316>God,<s%> <S%G3754>since<s%> you are <S%G1722>under<s%> the <S%G846>same<s%> <S%G2917>sentence<s%> of <S%G2917>condemnation<s%>?

"And we <S%G3303>indeed<s%> <S%G1346>justly,<s%> for we are <S%G618>receiving<s%> <S%G3739>what<s%> we <S%G514>deserve<s%> for our <S%G3739>deeds<s%><S%G4238>;<s%> but <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G3778>man<s%> has <S%G4238>done<s%> <S%G3762>nothing<s%> <S%G824>wrong.<s%>"
And he was <S%G3004>saying,<s%> <S%G2424>"Jesus,<s%> <S%G3403>remember<s%> me <S%G3752>when<s%> You <S%G2064>come<s%> in Your <S%G932>kingdom!<s%>"
And He <S%G3004>said<s%> to him, <S%G281>"Truly<s%> I <S%G3004>say<s%> to you, <S%G4594>today<s%> you shall be with Me in <S%G3857>Paradise.<s%>"

And it was <S%G2235>now<s%> <S%G5616>about<s%> the <S%G1623>sixth<s%> <S%G5610>hour,<s%> and <S%G4655>darkness<s%> <S%G1096>fell<s%> <S%G1909>over<s%> the <S%G3650>whole<s%> <S%G1093>land<s%> <S%G2193>until<s%> the <S%G7067>ninth<s%> <S%G5610>hour,<s%>
the <S%G2246>sun<s%> being <S%G1587>obscured;<s%> and the <S%G2665>veil<s%> of the <S%G3485>temple<s%> was <S%G4977>torn<s%> in <S%G3319>two.<s%>

And <S%G2424>Jesus,<s%> <S%G5455>crying<s%> out with a <S%G3173>loud<s%> <S%G5456>voice,<s%> <S%G3004>said,<s%> <S%G3962>"Father,<s%> into Thy <S%G5495>hands<s%> I <S%G3908>commit<s%> My <S%G4151>spirit.<s%>" And having <S%G3004>said<s%> <S%G3778>this,<s%> He <S%G1606>breathed<s%> His <S%G1606>last.<s%>

<S%G1161>Now<s%> when the <S%G1543>centurion<s%> <S%G3708>saw<s%> what had <S%G1096>happened,<s%> he [began] <S%G1392>praising<s%> <S%G2316>God,<s%> <S%G3004>saying,<s%> <S%G3689>"Certainly<s%> <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G444>man<s%> was <S%G1342>innocent.<s%>"

And <S%G3956>all<s%> the <S%G3793>multitudes<s%> who <S%G4836>came<s%> <S%G4836>together<s%> for <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G2335>spectacle,<s%> when they <S%G2334>observed<s%> what had <S%G1096>happened,<s%> [began] to <S%G5290>return,<s%> <S%G5180>beating<s%> their <S%G4738>breasts.<s%>

And <S%G3956>all<s%> His <S%G1110>acquaintances<s%> and the <S%G1135>women<s%> who <S%G4870>accompanied<s%> Him from <S%G1056>Galilee,<s%> were <S%G2476>standing<s%> at a <S%G3113>distance,<s%> <S%G3708>seeing<s%> <S%G3778>these<s%> <S%G3778>things.<s%>

And <S%G2400>behold,<s%> a <S%G435>man<s%> <S%G3686>named<s%> <S%G2501>Joseph,<s%> who was a <S%G1010>member<s%> of the <S%G1010>Council,<s%> a <S%G18>good<s%> and <S%G1342>righteous<s%> <S%G435>man<s%>

(he had not <S%G4784>consented<s%> to their <S%G1012>plan<s%> and <S%G4234>action<s%>), [a man] from <S%G707>Arimathea,<s%> a <S%G4172>city<s%> of the <S%G2453>Jews,<s%> <S%G3739>who<s%> was <S%G4327>waiting<s%> for the <S%G932>kingdom<s%> of <S%G2316>God;<s%>
<S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G3778>man<s%> <S%G4334>went<s%> to <S%G4091>Pilate<s%> and <S%G154>asked<s%> for the <S%G4983>body<s%> of <S%G2424>Jesus.<s%>

And he <S%G2507>took<s%> it <S%G2507>down<s%> and <S%G1794>wrapped<s%> it in a <S%G4616>linen<s%> <S%G4616>cloth,<s%> and <S%G5087>laid<s%> Him in a <S%G3418>tomb<s%> <S%G2991>cut<s%> into the <S%G2991>rock,<s%> <S%G3757>where<s%> <S%G3756>no<s%> <S%G3762>one<s%> had <S%G3768>ever<s%> <S%G2749>lain.<s%>
And it was the <S%G3904>preparation<s%> <S%G2250>day,<s%> and the <S%G4521>Sabbath<s%> was <S%G2020>about<s%> to <S%G2020>begin.<s%>

<S%G1161>Now<s%> the <S%G1135>women<s%> <S%G3748>who<s%> had <S%G4905>come<s%> with Him out of <S%G1056>Galilee<s%> <S%G2628>followed<s%> <S%G2628>after,<s%> and <S%G2300>saw<s%> the <S%G3419>tomb<s%> and <S%G5613>how<s%> His <S%G4983>body<s%> was <S%G5087>laid.<s%>

And they <S%G5290>returned<s%> and <S%G2090>prepared<s%> <S%G759>spices<s%> and <S%G3464>perfumes.<s%> And on the <S%G4521>Sabbath<s%> they <S%G2270>rested<s%> <S%G2596>according<s%> to the <S%G1785>commandment.<s%>
